overview: Craig McNeil is a founding member of the Mozido team. He architected Mozido’s platform, which introduced the first U.S. mWallet as well as the first U.S. originated international mobile money transfer. Prior to Mozido, he spent 9 years at Accenture where he consulted for high tech and mobile telecom companies worldwide. Craig has a Bachelors degree in Neuroscience, a Masters degree in Telecommunications and has been a member of the Institute of Electrical and Electronic Engineers (IEEE) for 10 years.
